description: Database configuration needs the base NestJS application.
mitigation_plan: Task is sequential within the same developer's workload.

description: The CD pipeline workflow depends on the Terraform files that define the deployment target.
mitigation_plan: Task is sequential within the same developer's workload.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire automated deployment capability.

description: The Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Guard depends on the JWT implementation to read user roles.
mitigation_plan: Define the JWT payload contract early in the sprint.

description: The PII anonymization logic is triggered by an event published from the 'Request Erasure' endpoint.
mitigation_plan: Define the event schema for `UserErasureRequested` upfront.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks completion of the Right to Erasure feature.
